channel.title: Lazy Eye Fix?
channel.description: Well, I've been traumatized with my lazy eye since I was born. I wasn't born with it; it just happened. It's in my left eye, and I'm wondering any effective ways to make it straight within ~3-6 months. Thanks.

item.title: Lazy Eye Fix?
item.dc:creator: @haticks haticks
item.description:
@haticks wrote:

Duct tape can fix anything…

but seriously, who even notices when people have lazy eyes…

Read full topic

item.title: Lazy Eye Fix?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

One of my friends has a lazy eye without glasses, but when he puts his glasses on it fixes itself. I don’t know if that’s an option for everyone or not though.

Read full topic

item.title: Lazy Eye Fix?

item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

goatee:

I heard sprinkling caffeine powder onto the lazy eye every 4 hours prevent it from becoming lazy.

LOOL

item.title: Lazy Eye Fix?
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“dragonfire455, post:9, topic:313845”][quote author=Frell link=topic=410342.msg3027223#msg3027223 date=1258085594]

[quote author=dragonfire455 link=topic=410342.msg3027215#msg3027215 date=1258085074]

if you cover your good eye with an eye patch you can work the muscles in you lazy eye.
[/quote]Well, I tried that and had little success; maybe, help by surgical means?

Keep working it.
[/quote]I tried the finger excersize and that kinda worked.[/quote]Wait so why did you ask in the original post for results within 3-6 months if you’re just going to try a few minutes instead?

Read full topic

item.title: Lazy Eye Fix?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

I had a lazy right eye when I was younger. I grew out of it. I can still part my eyes willfully, but it doesn’t wander to the right anymore.

I think more discipline than anything is what you need.

Read full topic

you can’t fix stupid

no, no its not

item.title: Lazy Eye Fix?
item.dc:creator: @chrisn2323 chrisn2323
item.description:
@chrisn2323 wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:10, topic:313845”]I don’t think you mean Lazy Eye, since I can’t see why that would traumatise you, unless you really don’t like having bad eyesight (and exercises wouldn’t help, because lazy eye is neurological :/)

If you mean a squint, then I was born with one. I did the patch thing and that didn’t do shit either. In the end I had surgery, which I seem to remember was a total bitch, but I was like 5 so everything was a total bitch then.[/quote]
wot
lazy eye is when ur eyeball floats around and you can’t control it

Read full topic

item.title: Lazy Eye Fix?
item.dc:creator: @dragonfire455 dragonfire455
item.description:
@dragonfire455 wrote:

[quote=“bootnecklad, post:14, topic:313845”][quote author=dragonfire455 link=topic=410342.msg3027522#msg3027522 date=1258131917]

Well, I’ve been traumatized with my lazy eye since I was born. I wasn’t born with it; it just happened. It’s in my left eye, and I’m wondering any effective ways to make it straight within ~3-6 months. Thanks.

he means to say that it was at a precisely early age
[I think]

what
how can you have been traumatized by it since you were born but you werent born with it; it just happened? >_<

my friend has a lazy eye and shes trained it up alot for years, its helped abit, sometimes it still gets lazy, but not often.

[/quote]Yeah, I got it from oxygen deprivation in the incubation chamber I was in for a month (I was born three months premature, no noticeable side effects from that.)

inb4 making you retarded! <3[/quote]Love you too baby <3333

Read full topic

item.title: Lazy Eye Fix?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

I don’t think you mean Lazy Eye, since I can’t see why that would traumatise you, unless you really don’t like having bad eyesight (and exercises wouldn’t help, because lazy eye is neurological :/)

If you mean a squint, then I was born with one. I did the patch thing and that didn’t do shit either. In the end I had surgery, which I seem to remember was a total bitch, but I was like 5 so everything was a total bitch then.

Read full topic
